title: Silver Clash Team
body: need a jungler for PIMP Squad

replies.body: looking for a team to join; im S5  and can play all roles pretty decently, maining support n jungle. I'm really keen to compete in the tourny.... happy to join a team or be apart of making one if there is enough interest and people....
Jungler/top main add me in game if you still need the player {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}} silver 3.

Im interested, im silver v at the moment, was gold v last season, i usually main mid or ADC however im flexible and have a decent range of champions i can play in jg, im pretty cool headed and don't tend to get tilted. 
Summoner ID: OrangeRuffy
